name: PONG On Solana
description: PONG, the number one game Since 1972, is coming to Solana in an Entire New Way. Here comes Play to Earn on Pong with a Twist. You will be able to Earn SOL/[PONG] by Playing Tournaments, PVP, and PVE with your NFT Player. There will be 2 NFT Drops. You will be able to get Different Players and Balls. For the Player that scored the last Goal, the ball will change to their NFT Ball. There would also be a Battle pass Earning system. Every New Battle pass Series comes with a New Marketplace to sell your Rewards. There will also be an Airdrop for Player NFT holders. The Airdrop will contain different Emotes to distract your component. There will be More Information On Road Map.
